name: Truffle Mushroom Risotto
descr: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with truffle-infused mushroom broth, finished with Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs.

name: Foie Gras Pate with Fig Jam
descr: Rich and velvety foie gras pate served with house-made fig jam, toasted brioche, and a sprinkle of sea salt.

name: Seared Scallops with Citrus Beurre Blanc
descr: Fresh scallops seared to perfection, served on a bed of creamy citrus beurre blanc sauce with a hint of acidity from lemon and orange.

name: Classic Caesar Salad with Grilled Shrimp
descr: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with grilled shrimp, croutons, and shaved Parmesan cheese.

name: Crispy Fried Calamari with Lemon Aioli
descr: Tender calamari rings coated in a crispy batter, deep-fried to golden perfection, and served with tangy lemon aioli dipping sauce.

name: Filet Mignon with Red Wine Reduction
descr: Tender and juicy filet mignon steak cooked to the desired level of doneness, served with a rich red wine reduction sauce and accompanied by seasonal vegetables.

name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
descr: Fresh salmon fillet pan-seared to crispy skin, drizzled with a luscious lemon butter sauce, and served with roasted potatoes and vegetables.

name: Lobster Tail with Garlic Butter
descr: Succulent lobster tail broiled with garlic butter, served with drawn butter, lemon wedges, and your choice of side dish.

name: Vegetarian Risotto with Seasonal Vegetables
descr: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a medley of fresh seasonal vegetables, Parmesan cheese, and a touch of truffle oil, topped with crispy fried shallots.

name: Duck Breast with Cherry Port Wine Sauce
descr: Pan-seared duck breast cooked to a perfect medium-rare, served with a sweet and tangy cherry port wine sauce, and accompanied by creamy polenta and roasted Brussels sprouts.

name: Crème Brûlée with Fresh Berries
descr: Classic French dessert with a caramelized sugar crust, creamy vanilla custard, and a garnish of fresh mixed berries.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake with Raspberry Coulis
descr: Decadent chocolate lava cake with a molten chocolate center, served warm with a tangy raspberry coulis and a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Tiramisu with Espresso and Amaretto
descr: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and a hint of amaretto liqueur, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Lemon Tart with Fresh Blueberries
descr: Tangy and sweet lemon tart with a buttery shortbread crust, topped with fresh blueberries and a dusting of powdered sugar.

name: Vanilla Bean Panna Cotta with Mixed Berry Compote
descr: Silky smooth vanilla bean panna cotta topped with a vibrant mixed berry compote and a sprig of fresh mint.
